## üöÄ Suite√°il

Suite√°il √≥ pypi:

```bash
pip install pyhelper-tools-jbhm
```

---

## üìñ Forbhreathn√∫

** Is √©ard at√° i gceist le Pyhelper ** n√° Python Foireann Uirlis√≠ at√° deartha chun anail√≠s sonra√≠, l√©irshamhl√∫, oibr√≠ochta√≠ staitisti√∫la, agus sreafa√≠ oibre f√≥ntais a shimpli√∫ **.  
Comhth√°tha√≠onn s√© gan str√≥ i dtionscadail acad√∫la, taighde agus gairmi√∫la, rud a ligeann duit d√≠ri√∫ ar l√©argais seachas ar ch√≥d coire.

Bunt√°ist√≠ t√°bhachtacha:
- üßÆ T√≥gtha ** Staitistic√≠ agus f√≥ntais mata ** 
-üìä √âasca le h√∫s√°id ** Fillte√°in Amharcl√©irithe Sonra√≠ ** 
- üóÇ Handy ** L√°imhse√°il agus Cuardach Comhad ** 
- üîç ** Bail√≠ocht√∫ Comhr√©ir ** le haghaidh Python comhaid
-üåç ** Taca√≠ocht iltheanga ** le haistri√∫ch√°in r√©idh le h√∫s√°id
- üöÄ optamaithe le haghaidh ** fr√©amhshamhl√∫ tapa ** agus ** oideachas ** 

---

## ‚ú® Pr√≠omhghn√©ithe

### üìä Amharcl√©iri√∫ sonra√≠
- Barra√≠ Barra√≠: cothrom√°nach & ingearach (`hbar`, `vbar`)  
- Ceapacha D√°ileach√°in: Histeagraim (`histo`), ceapacha bosca (`boxplot`), ceapacha KDE (`kdeplot`)  
- Ceapacha Compar√°ideacha: Veidhl√≠n, Swarm, Strip Plots  
- Anail√≠s ar chomhghaol: Teasmaps (`heatmap`), Plots scaipthe (`scatter`)  
- Ard -Amharcl√©irithe: Ceapacha P√©ire, Comhphlota√≠, Ceapacha aisch√©imnithe  
- T√°bla√≠ Sonra√≠: Taispe√°ntais T√°bla Form√°idithe (`table`)  

### üìà Anail√≠s Staitisti√∫il
- ** Claonadh l√°rnach ** : me√°n (`get_media`), airmhe√°n (`get_median`), m√≥d (`get_moda`)  
- ** Scaipeadh ** : raon (`get_rank`), athraitheas (`get_var`), diall caighde√°nach (`get_desv`)  
- ** Anail√≠s ** : Tuarasc√°lacha Scaipthe (`disp`), R√≠omhaireachta√≠ IQR, Normal√∫, Claochl√∫ Coinn√≠ollach  
- ** Braite Outlier ** : Modhanna IQR agus Z-Sc√≥r  

### üóÇÔ∏è Bainist√≠ocht Comhad
- Fionnachtain chliste le `call()` (auto-detect CSV, JSON, XML, etc.)  
- Taca√≠ocht il-fhorm√°id (CSV, JSON, XML, PDF, spatial data)  
- Bainist√≠ocht bunachar sonra√≠ SQL le aicme `DataBase`  
- F√≥ntais tiontaithe (`convert_file`)  

### üõ†Ô∏è Uirlis√≠ Forbr√≥ra
- C√≥ras lasc (`Switch`, `AsyncSwitch`)  
- Seice√°il comhr√©ir (`check_syntax`, `PythonFileChecker`)  
- Tuairisci√∫ earr√°ide saibhir (multi-language)  
- C√≥ras cabhrach comhth√°ite (`help`)  

### üåç Idirn√°isi√∫n√∫
- 100+ Aistri√∫ch√°in T√≥gtha isteach  
- Aistri√∫ch√°in saincheaptha a lucht√∫  
.


### Staitistic√≠ Bun√∫sacha
```python
import helper as hp

data = [1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5]

print(hp.get_media(data))   # Mean
print(hp.get_median(data))  # Median
print(hp.get_moda(data))    # Mode
```

### l√©irshamhl√∫
```python
import helper as hp

df = hp.pd.DataFrame({"values": [5, 3, 7, 2, 9]})
hp.histo(df, "values", bins=5, title="Sample Histogram")
```

L√°imhse√°il comhad ###
```python
from helper import call

data = call(name="my_data", type="csv")  # Finds and loads a CSV file automatically
```

### Aistri√∫ch√°in Chustaim
```python
from helper import load_user_translations

# Load custom translations from lang.json
load_user_translations("custom/lang.json")
```

### Comhr√©ir Bail√≠ocht√∫
```python
from helper import run

run("./path/to/my_script.py")
#Show gui pop up with results
```

---

Strucht√∫r Tionscadail ## üìÇ

```
helper/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ core.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ __init__.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lang/
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ en.json
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ es.json
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ... (100+ files)
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ submodules/
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ graph.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ statics.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ utils.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ caller.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ checker.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manager.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pyswitch.py
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ shared.py
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DBManager.py
```

## üîÆ Treochl√°r

- Cine√°lacha breise l√©irshamhlaithe

- Taca√≠ocht bhunachar sonra√≠ s√≠nte (NoSQL, graph databases)

- Comhth√°th√∫ Foghlama Meais√≠n

- Comh√©adan gr√©as√°nbhunaithe

- C√≥ras breise√°in
